project.description: test the u77 all instruction each day

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo $BUILD_NUMBER hostname env pwd
. /sifive/tools/Modules/3.2.10/init/sh . /sifive/tools/Modules/3.2.10/init/bash
echo $WORKSPACE echo $EXECUTOR_NUMBER export JENKINS_BUILDS_DIR=/scratch/jenkins/archived-builds
# Create the Jenkins build dir if it doesn't exist mkdir -p $JENKINS_BUILDS_DIR cd $JENKINS_BUILDS_DIR echo $PWD
mkdir -p $JOB_NAME/$BUILD_NUMBER cd $JOB_NAME/$BUILD_NUMBER echo $PWD
# Setting federation folder git clone git@github.com:sifive/federation.git cd federation
# Initialize git submodules and necessary environment variables ./scripts/quick-submodule-update . ./rc.d/riscv-tools.bashrc
# Build the configure IP mkdir builds export BUILD_DIR=builds ./generate-build coreip_u77_axi4 cd builds/coreip_u77_axi4/ . ./load-modules make sim
cd sim export SALLOC_ACCOUNT='verif' ./sitest @../../../test-outlines/coreip_u77_axi4.outline --sim=verilator --superseed=$(date +%s) -j 20 -b
cd sim find . -name "score.json" > VTG.log
cp VTG.log /home/maxl/jenkins_Sting_result/VTG_$BUILD_NUMBER.log
